name: TankShmUp
description:
Kill zombies and buy upgrades to survive

Controls: Left click - Shoot Right/Middle click - Open upgrades menu

* Disclaimer: It can be a bit buggy sometimes, but restarting the game usually fixes that

Github repo: https://github.com/Dash-L/minijam114

Made with Rust + Bevy

All sprites and sounds made by Joshguyman in aseprite and sfxr respectively
